name: 404 - Body Not Found
description:
A small robot must assemble a large body for itself after having been left in a science lab for decades. It must gather the parts needed to continuously upgrade itself until it fits the humanoid requirements to leave the lab.

Solve puzzles to explore the lab and install upgrade parts. Utilize the installed parts to solve even more puzzles and further explore, searching for the exit!

presented by Short Circuit Entertainment

Anique Auguste - UI Artist

Jazlyn Dukes - Environment/Prop Artist

Christian Fontanez - Level Designer

Moses Kim - Mechanics Programmer

Christopher Loso - Character Artist

Zakhar Sheyko - Procedural Generation Programmer

Eleazor Pringle - Environment/Prop Artist
